label: 琴
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: A term that in the tale may refer to any stringed instrument, including the biwa (see entry).  More usually it designates one of a class of long, zither-like instruments that rest on the floor before the player.  These include the  kin, the sō no koto, and the wagon (see entries for each).[琵琶、琴、箏の琴、和琴][RK]
